main event: A civilian observed an erratic, zig-zag, triangular, orange, and fast-moving object near Altus, Oklahoma on June 29, 1960.
interesting points: The object approached to within 2-3 miles of the observers and then sped up and disappeared.
The observers were just waking up and viewed the object through their windows.
The sighting lasted for approximately 1 minute.
The object was described as triangular and orange in color.
The preliminary analysis suggests the object may have been the landing light of an aircraft making an approach to the nearby Altus Air Force Base.
